description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
Northampton Lodge, 39A Canonbury Square, Islington, London, N1 2AN

TPO Reference:
T1 – Robinia of LBI TPO (No.286) 2006
T2 – Robinia of LBI TPO (No.286) 2006
T3 – Black Poplar of LBI TPO (No.286) 2006
T4 – Black Poplar of LBI TPO (No.286) 2006
T8 – Sycamore of LBI TPO (No.286) 2006
T9 – Laburnum of LBI TPO (No.286) 2006
 
PO Number:
T090559

Work specifications:

1 x Robinia (T1) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.286) 2006.
Crown lift up to a maximum height of 4m above ground level and 5.5m above ground level over the highway.
Prune back to clear property by 1.5m.

1 x Robinia (T2) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.286) 2006.
Crown lift up to crown break.
Crown reduce and reshape by 30%.

1 x Black Poplar (T3) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.286) 2006.
Reduce low laterals by up to 35%.
Prune to clear property by up to 4m.
Reduce in height by up to 25%.
Crown thin by up to 20%.

1 x Black Poplar (T4) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.286) 2006.
Lift to crown break, ensuring 5.5m clearance over the road.
Crown thin by up to 20%.

1 x Sycamore (T8) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.286) 2006.
Lift over the parasol by the removal 2x sub-lateral branches.

1 x Laburnum (T9) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.286) 2006.
Prune to give 1m clearance from the property.
